name: Real Essentials 3 Pack: Women's Ultra-Soft Lounge Joggers Sweatpants Athletic Yoga Pants with Pockets (Available in Plus)

title: So soft!
content: I’m very happy with these pants! A little thinner than I expected, but still very nice. I’m pretty tall and have issues with lounge pants being a little high in the ankle, but not with these. Great fit, pockets, drawstring, and material. And so buttery soft and cozy!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Love the fit! True to size can wear out or at home. Loved them so I order another set in different colors. Great fit had to have more! Light weight but still warm quality material made right and worth the buy! Size Lg I’m 5’8” 160lbs Ordered a large
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2024

title: Super soft and comfy!
content: Got the “RealEssentials” Ladies Yummy Lounge Jogger three-pac. Good value for the 3 pair. There very comfortable and my wife just loves them. She pulls them up and wears them like Capri’s. They’re very soft and warm and the size was perfect for my wife. They came in three different colors and the pants do have 2 pockets. They look really nice on her. They’re not just for lounging, they’re great for wearing out doing your errands or whatever you do during the day.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: True to size I am a size 2x but usually I size up because thing are two small and so I got a 3x ,but honestly wish I bought the 2x because they are a little big, but they are so comfortable to ware. They still fix because I can tie the string  The material is soft and very stretchy. Pockets are deep they can hold a lot of thing like keys, two phones, chap sticks. I have these now for a couple months I've wash them and they don't shrinkage they stay the same which I love.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2024

title: Stylish and very comfortable
content: These are very soft, fit nicely and look good.  However, they are VERY thin. If you want something warm, these are not the pants. Otherwise,  they are fine.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: These are lightweight, my daughter says comfy. I wouldnt trust anything to stay in the pockets, but they do have pockets. They fit true to size and for 3 pair @ $30, they are a good value. I don't know how long they will last, but if only for one school year they are worth the money.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024

title: Great fit
content: I love these pants! They’re very soft and stretchy. They have deep pockets and are a cute jogger style. They’re a bit thin so they’re not very warm but they are perfect for lounging around the house.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: The fit of the pants are great, no shrinking from washing/drying that I can tell. But the ties on the pants are really bad quality and have torn up from one wear. Other than that, they are good. Not warm though, just nice comfy home pants.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2024

title: So thin
content: I was looking for a nice pair of pants for work (i work in childcare) and we are not allowed to wear leggings, so I thought “maybe these will be the go around!” They are soft, stretchy legging material; but in the form of sweatpants. I got a 3X, and I am about 5’10 and 280 pounds. They are amazing!!! They are a little loose in some areas like my thighs and legs, and my waist, but the drawstring makes it fit easily and nice! I love it. I would say order your normal, if you’re worried; size up and you’ll be fine because you can easily tie the draw string to for your waist or hips as needed.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: These sweatpants are pretty comfortable but I will say they are a thinner material than I was expecting. They are also much smaller than I would anticipate. I am 5’4 and around 180 pounds (normally a medium or large) and I ordered the XL. They are a good size for me, but I would recommend sizing up or looking at the size chart if you don’t want them to be like leggings
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2024

title: Nice Pant
content: These were a soft fabric and not stiff or heavy at all. I got them to just hang out in or wear around the house. There was a "flow" to them. They're not super long, but I am a bit short, so the Small size for me was perfect.  They're not too too big, I'd say they're just right.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Plus size lady who hits the gym. I love that these are lightweight and not meant to be form fitting. I'm also super short and these are a good length. Got the jogger cuff.

title: Nice but thin

title: Verified Purchase
content: These are the perfect utility pants for women. The fabric weight is perfect - light enough to be breathable and to move in but just heavy enough to wear on colder days too. The fit is great with a wide waistband that can tie if you need but that I can roll to sit exactly where I like them on my body. I washed and dried in my machines but they retained their size and comfort.

title: So Comfortable

title: Took 3 orders in different sizes to get the right size.
content: Difficult to buy something loose fitting/or tight when they don't put the actual measurement of the garment width/length on the chart size.  I think all clothing companies should change to this method of sizing.  Not all companies are using the same size guide which leads to returns and reorders.  After the 3rd order I got what I wanted and I love them.  Bought 6 total and will buy more!!!  I didn't have any of the sewing problems other people mentioned.
